timeline.message:
fix(cli): avoid npm gitignore rename on new plugins (#3292)

Co-authored-by: jcesarmobile <jcesarmobile@gmail.com>
fix(android): don't return 404 on empty files (#3323)
fix(ios): only open a URL when the application is active (#3328)
fix(android): Provide a file name when an image is saved to the gallery to prevent crash (#3331)
chore: make deploy script push to 2.x branch (#3337)

Merge branch '2.x' into main

Conflicts:
	.github/bot.yml
	.github/workflows/capacitor-bot.yml
	CHANGELOG.md
	README.md
	android/capacitor/src/main/java/com/getcapacitor/WebViewLocalServer.java
	android/capacitor/src/main/java/com/getcapacitor/plugin/Camera.java
	android/capacitor/src/main/java/com/getcapacitor/plugin/camera/ImageUtils.java
	android/capacitor/src/main/java/com/getcapacitor/plugin/notification/DateMatch.java
	android/capacitor/src/main/java/com/getcapacitor/plugin/notification/LocalNotificationManager.java
	android/capacitor/src/main/java/com/getcapacitor/plugin/notification/TimedNotificationPublisher.java
	android/package.json
	cli/package.json
	cli/src/tasks/new-plugin.ts
	core/package.json
	electron/package.json
	example/src/pages/camera/camera.html
	example/src/pages/camera/camera.ts
	ios/Capacitor/Capacitor/CAPBridgeViewController.swift
	ios/Capacitor/Capacitor/Plugins/Camera.swift
	ios/package.json
	lerna.json
	scripts/deploy.sh

timeline.bodyText: @dwieeb this should consider the flag from the setting (settings.preserveAspectRatio), right?
timeline.author: iphilgood

replies.author: jcesarmobile

replies.bodyText: Thanks, these were not easy conflicts to resolve. 😂
replies.author: imhoffd
